mapper.insert: insert into question (id, title, gmt_create, gmt_modified, creator_id, comment_count, view_count, like_count, tag, description) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{viewCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{likeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
